price: (148) So Allāh gave them the reward of this world and the good reward of the Hereafter. And Allāh loves the doers of good.
arabic: فَـَٔاتَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۗ وَٱللَّهُ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faātāhumu al-lahu thawāba al-dun'yā waḥus'na thawābi al-ākhirati wal-lahu yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
